entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High plus 1. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries late this morning and this afternoon with risk of freezing drizzle. Wind south 20 km/h becoming light early this morning. Wind becoming southwest 20 gusting to 40 this morning. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 14 this morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM CST Friday 03 March 2023
